entry.title: Ice Cream Ahead (June 2024 Wallpapers Edition)
entry.summary: Let’s kick off June with some fresh inspiration! Artists and designers from across the globe once again tickled their creativity to celebrate the beginning of the new month with a collection of beautiful and unique wallpaper calendars.

entry.title: How Suz Hinton went from Dev to White Hat Hacker [Podcast #126]
entry.summary: On this week's episode of the podcast, freeCodeCamp founder Quincy Larson interviews Suz Hinton. She's a software engineer, security researcher, and one of the first ever people to live-stream her coding on Twitch. We talk about: How Suz started her...
